# networkEndpoint

**Instance Property**

An object that describes a local-network device.

## Declaration

```swift
var networkEndpoint: NWEndpoint? { get set }
```

## Discussion

For the discovery of local-network devices, the extension sets the value of this property to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Network/NWBrowser/Result/endpoint] of an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Network/NWBrowser/Result]. When a search over the local network succeeds, the browser passes the newly discovered device into your extension’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Network/NWBrowser/browseResultsChangedHandler].

## Indicating the protocol

- **protocol**: The manner in which the system applies your app’s device discovery extension.
- **DDDevice.Protocol**: An identifier for the manner in which an app interacts with a device.
- **protocolType**: A custom universal type that describes the device’s manner of communication with the extension.
- **bluetoothIdentifier**: An identifier to communicate with the device through Bluetooth wireless technology.
